column12:
The hero is wandering an endless road.
Continue ahead using 👣 Walk.

🌀 Roll or 🔰 Block to avoid getting hit.
Enemies spend 🟢 Energy to attack.

🖐 Grab any helpful items along the way.
💤 Rest to regain 🟢 Energy and 🔵 Mana.

Choose a character perk to shape the skills.
Some may come with a sacrifice.

Nothing but endless trees all around.
👣 Walk to explore further ahead.

The crow appears to be going for the eyes.
Quickly cover before the impact.

Just a piece of rock laying on the ground.
No reason to bother stopping here.

The poor thing has a sunlight shock.
Looks like it got a burst of energy.

Cute on the first glance.
Ferocious on the second.

This looks like a nice place to rest.
Perhaps make use of it.

Its majestic antlers look rather deadly.
Better not underestimate it.

Cozy place of rest for whoever set it up.
Chance to loot for someone else.

Stumbled upon an unknown map.
There are notes around the edges.

It is still hot and untouched.
Who would leave it like that?

Noticed suspicious activity in their camp.
\"Never should have come here!\"

Another bunch of trees in the forest.
A chance to catch a breath.

Stares ahead without blinking an eye.
Almost feels like about to speak.

The creature looks kind of aggressive.
But its eyes say otherwise.

Eerie atmosphere is in the air.
Better not stick around.

It appears to be very upset.
Beware its mighty attack.

Calming aura radiates all around.
Chance for a breather.

It jumped out of nowhere really fast.
Better raise the shield.

A giant stone facing the heavens.
Must be thousands years old.

Another crow appeared from somewhere.
Seems to be looking for its mate.

The pouch was covered by the blanket.
Looks like there's something inside.

The owner could be nearby.
I'd rather not mess with it.

The creature boasts sinister energy.
Better to not underestimate.

Seems like a fine refreshment.
The lid is trembling though.
column13: The honeypot was full of bees.

column12:
The bees instantly swarmed the area.
There's nowhere to run

Loud stomps follow its steps.
Must weight a ton.

Still all warm and bloody.
Sadly there's no fire around.
column13: Got sick of the raw meat

column12:
This house has been long neglected.
Maybe there's something valuable left?

Appears to be clean and empty.
Might come in handy later.
